entry.title: Help with PR 3845
entry.summary: A new pull request has been made on the Github page for Bitcoin. The pull request, located at https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/3845, adds a method for removing a single wallet transaction. Dan, the person who submitted the pull request, is requesting that others review and test the code. This new feature will allow users to remove individual transactions, which could be useful when dealing with problematic or unwanted transactions.
